data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Brachinus Weber, 1801 from the Philippines, with a modified key to species (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Brachininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Mingyi, Deuve, Thierry (2013): Three new species of the genus Brachinus Weber, 1801 from the Philippines, with a modified key to species (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Brachininae). Zootaxa 3737 (3): 289-294, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.3.7
